hero.title: Seamlessly Migrate & Optimize Your eCommerce to Shopify
hero.subheadline: Transform your eCommerce business with Brancoy HI Engine - the intelligent AI powered migration tool that doesn't just move your data, but continuously optimizes it.

smartestWay.title: The Smartest Way to Move to Shopify

collectData.title: Collect Data
collectData.description: HI Engine securely gathers your products, customers, orders, and content from any platform. Whether you're on WooCommerce, Magento, BigCommerce, custom builds, or integrating with ERPs, PIM systems, or other tools, HI Engine prepares your data for seamless Shopify integration.

analyze.title: Analyze
analyze.description: Once your data is collected, our AI engine reviews and optimizes it. It automatically generates high-quality product descriptions, suggests relevant keywords for search visibility, and highlights areas where your data can be cleaned or improved for better performance.

localize.title: Localize
localize.description: Your store isn't just moving, it's expanding. HI Engine adapts your content, currency, and SEO to each target market, using localized language, pricing, and tone to help you truly connect with regional audiences from day one.

contentSeo.title: Content & SEO Optimization
contentSeo.description: Seamlessly resize images, edit backgrounds, and optimize text for SEO. Powered by insights from Google Search Console and Google Trends, your visuals and content stay polished, search-optimized, and built to boost your brand's visibility.

collaborate.title: Collaborate Together
collaborate.description: We're not replacing your team — we're working with it. Brancoy's experts and the HI Engine operate side-by-side with you, combining human creativity and machine precision to solve problems, spot opportunities, and accelerate growth.

succeedWithShopify.title: Succeed with Shopify
succeedWithShopify.description: The result: a future-proof Shopify store built to scale. You get a clean, high-performing foundation — fully optimized, locally adapted, and ready to grow with you, no matter your catalog size or global ambitions.

foundation.title: The Foundation for Intelligent eCommerce
foundation.description: Moving to Shopify with Brancoy is more than just changing platforms. It's about building the foundation for future growth, agility, and intelligence in your ecommerce business. It all starts with a free migration assessment.

benefit1.title: Future-Proof Foundation
benefit1.description: A migration designed to support your business growth for years to come.

benefit2.title: Focus on Growth
benefit2.description: Free yourself from technical tasks and focus on business strategy.

benefit3.title: Scalable AI Power
benefit3.description: Whether you have 500 or 50,000 SKUs, our AI scales with your needs.

socialProof.title: Trusted by Businesses Like Yours
socialProof.placeholder: Testimonials and client logos will appear here.

finalCta.title: Meet the Brancoy AI Engine Built for Commerce.
finalCta.description: Migration will never be the same. Let's build your future on Shopify, intelligently.
